code: var log=console.log;export var logoutUser=function logoutUser(ctx){log('Logging out user and saving details...');var users=ctx.state.userDB;var activeUser=ctx.state.activeUser;users[activeUser.hash]=activeUser;ctx.setState({activeUser:null,userDB:users},function(){log("User ".concat(ctx.state.activeUser===null?'successfully':'unsuccessfully'," logged out"));});};
